mapper.sql: id,PayInterfaceId, PassageName, IfCode, IfTypeCode, PayType, Status, PassageRate, MaxDayAmount, MaxEveryAmount, MinEveryAmount, TradeStartTime, TradeEndTime, RiskStatus, Remark, CreateTime, UpdateTime,CallbackIp
mapper.select:
select sum(currentDaysRecharge) as currentDaysRecharge,sum(oneDaysRecharge)as oneDaysRecharge,sum(twoDaysRecharge) as twoDaysRecharge from ( SELECT sum( Amount ) AS currentDaysRecharge,0 AS oneDaysRecharge,0 AS twoDaysRecharge FROM t_pay_order WHERE `status` in(3) and CreateTime > "${createTimeStart}" and CreateTime < "${createTimeEnd}"
union all SELECT 0, sum( Amount ) AS oneDaysRecharge ,0 FROM t_pay_order WHERE CreateTime > "${oneDaysDate} 00:00:00" and CreateTime < "${oneDaysDate} 23:59:59" and `status` in(3)
union all SELECT 0,0, sum( Amount ) AS twoDaysRecharge FROM t_pay_order WHERE CreateTime > "${twoDaysDate} 00:00:00" and CreateTime < "${twoDaysDate} 23:59:59" and `status` in(3) )bcc
mapper.insert: insert into t_pay_passage (id, PassageName, IfCode, IfTypeCode, PayType, Status, PassageRate, MaxDayAmount, MaxEveryAmount, MinEveryAmount, TradeStartTime, TradeEndTime, RiskStatus, Remark, CreateTime, UpdateTime) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{passageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ifCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ifTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{passageRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{maxDayAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{maxEveryAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{minEveryAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tradeStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{riskStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
